summary: So this is a simple bat file to make characters modified by Bijin Warmaidens, Bijin Wives and Bijin NPC's essential since fore some reason they are unaffected by NPC's Protected Redux.
descriptionHtml:
So I installed all the Bijin mods (Warmaidens, Wives and NPC's), and i was so happy with all the flawless
beautiful women in my game but then a vampire attacked and 3 of them died. I cried !
Since I had NPC's Protected Redux by Blattgeist they are supposed to be unkillable but for some reason
the Modded characters are not. So i made a simple bat file to make them essential
decided to share it in case some of you might want it too. 

Installation 
Copy and paste the text file into your installation folder (Not Data!)
Where your skse.exe file is located. 
Run Game, Load Save Your Save then Open Console.
Type : bat bijindo press enter.
DONE

DLC characters and Essential by default characters not included.


Credits

rxkx22 for Bijin Wives, Bijin Warmaidens, Bijin NPC's
Mebantiza for Bijin All In One
author: cutepuppykilla
